participant_1.background:
I got to take a lot of amazing photos of my favorite baseball player.
i am adopted.
I have never been married, but I've been with my partner for over ten years.
i am highly educated.
my sister is becoming my mother and often asks me when i am getting married.

participant_2.background:
I am passionate about my family.
i know karate.
I remember visiting the petting zoo with my parents and brother when I was a kid.
i have an older brother.
i enjoys kayaking in my free time.

content.text: Hi! It was good, thank you. I went kayaking with my brother.
That sounds fun! I love kayaking. Where did you go kayaking?
We went kayaking in the river near my house. The water was really calm and it was a beautiful day.
That sounds lovely. I love being on the water.
Me too. It's so peaceful and relaxing.
What are some other things you like to do for fun?
I like to go hiking, biking, and camping. I also enjoy playing video games and watching movies.
I like all of those things too! I'm a big fan of video games and movies. I also like to read and play board games.
Me too! I love to read and board games are always fun.
What are some of your favorite books?
I love the Harry Potter series and the Hunger Games series. I also enjoy reading mystery and suspense novels.
I love the Harry Potter series too! I haven't read the Hunger Games series yet, but I've heard good things about it.
You should definitely read it. It's a great series.
I will have to check it out.
